relation: The player has made at least 5 Gold-level performances.
The Player has completed all Extreme tracks.
The player has completed Container Rush without releasing the throttle even for an instant.
The player has completely destroyed the motorcycle and broken every single bone in a single crash.
The player has completed all hard tracks.
The player has completed the Ultimate Endurance tournament without any faults.
Skyrocketing in Stock Market is only temporary. Be prepared for the fall and the big bang.
Get a strike in a midnight bowling event.
The player has unlocked the first tournament.
The player has saved his/her first custom track.
The player has unlocked every track in the game.
The player has completed Groundhog Returns faultlessly without changing the rider's posture.

textAfterTable: Pass one medium track with a gold medal result Skill game "Infernal Pinball": Pass three medium tracks with gold medal results Skill game "Loose Screw": Pass one easy track with a gold medal result Skill game "Target Hunt": Pass all tracks in any of the eight tournaments to unlock that tournament Tournaments: Contributed By: TraderSam. Big Pack DLC Achievements Complete each achievement to receive the allotted gamerscore. Unlockable How to Unlock Bounce 5 trampolines in succession in Skyway to reach new heights. Look Ma, I can fly! (20) Which box to choose and when to bailout? No Deal (15) Catch a ride and surf on top of a lowrider in Dangerous Ride. Can you go the distance? Piggyback (15) Contributed By: Guard Master. Secret Gamer Pic When you unlock the Full Throttle achievement, you also unlock a Trials HD gamer pic. Contributed By: Thunder_Cat_1. Secret Gamer Pic To unlock a Trials HD gamer pic featuring a demon with handle bars for horns, you must beat all extreme tracks. Contributed By: Thunder_Cat_1. Achievements Achievements
